title: Advertising
image_desc: A colorful and eye-catching advertisement for a new product, featuring a bright background, bold text, and a captivating image.
content: - Advertising is a form of communication used to persuade an audience to take some action, such as buying a product or service.
It can be found in many forms, including television commercials, print ads, online banners, and social media posts.
narration: Advertising is all around us! It's how companies try to get our attention and convince us to buy their products. From TV commercials to social media posts, advertising comes in many forms.  It's important to be aware of advertising and how it can influence our choices.
